text: Fernando Mario Herrera Mamani (31 July 1966 - 25 October 2021) was a Peruvian politician and academic. He was born in Lima, Peru. In July 2021, he became a member of the Peruvian Congress. He was elected as a member of the Free Peru Party. Herrera Mamani died of cardiac arrest on 25 October 2021 in Lima at the age of 55.Fallece congresista de Per√∫ Libre Fernando Herrera Mamani ==References== Category:1966 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from cardiac arrest Category:Peruvian academics Category:Politicians from Lima
